<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1944]]''' – [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] receives a letter from 12 year old John Barrow from [[wikipedia:Westtown Township, Chester County, Pennsylvania
October}}: West town, Pennsylvania]]. The boy has already read ''[[The Hobbit]]'' eleven times, and his use of the term "Gee Whiz" delights Tolkien.

<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1964]]''' - The third episode of the [[Princess]]-serialization of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' is published.
* '''[[2007]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]: [[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
October}}: Shadows of Angmar]]'', "[[Prisoner of the Free Peoples]]" is released in North America.

<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[2010]]''' - New features are added to the 1994 online game ''[[The Two Towers MUD]]'', including a Facebook application.
** [[Tuor]], guided by [[Voronwë]], travels to [[Gondolin]] in order to deliver [[Ulmo]]'s message to [[Turgon]].
** [[Frodo Baggins]] awakes in [[Rivendell]], recovered from his wound, and meets [[Gandalf]].
** [[Elrond]] makes a feast where Frodo meets [[Glóin]]. [[Elladan]] and [[Elrohir]] return and talk to [[Aragorn]]. Evening at the [[Hall of Fire]] where Frodo meets [[Bilbo Baggins]].
